title: Education (Public Higher Education Institution) (Declaration) Order, 2022
content:
3rd June, 2022 Statutory Instruments 809
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 39 OF 2022
The Higher Education Act, 2013
(Act No. 4 of 2013)
The Education (Public Higher Education Institution)
(Declaration) Order, 2022
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 14 of the Higher
Education Act, 2013, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Public Higher Title
Education Institution) (Declaration) Order, 2022.
2. (1) The Zambia Information and Communications Tech- Declaration
of Zambia
nology College is declared as a Public Higher Education
University
Institution. College of
Technology
(2) The Zambia Information and Communication Technology
College shall be re-named as Zambia University College of
Technology.
D. SIAKALIMA,
LUSAKA Minister of Education
27th May, 2022
[MOE/2]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101, Lusaka, Price K4.00 each
